author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-3533 - break the loop of CLMR through contribution to the components an the implementations themselves that are loaded by CLMR

author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-3533 - disable registration of the dummy config. Doesn't seem to affect the runtime now we've moved to 1.5.1 and it causes the Axis2 shutdown hook to be registered twice. When this happens one of the shutdown hooks is not removed on node stop and we have a leak.

author: pradeepkth
msg: PIG-1369: POProject does not handle null tuples and non existent fields in some cases (pradeepkth)
